content: X-EMTC MX Metal cable holder Metal cable/conduit clip for use with collated nails ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX/DX nailers for easy handling Bracing rib for high rigidity and a tight, secure hold on flexible conduits Quick, cost-efficient fastening Engineered for high-quality, reliable fastening Virtually dust-free fastening Applications Fastening electrical cables Fastening flexible and rigid electrical conduits Fastening water and heating pipes Fastening injection hoses ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material: Carbon steel Base materials: Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel Approvals: N/A Technical Data | Application | Cable Fastenings, Conduit Fastening | Material | Carbon steel | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | N/A | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Material composition | Fixation element: Galvanized steel sheet, zinc coating 10-20 µm, Plastic component: Polyamide (halogen and silicone free) | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 228334 - Conduit clip X-BX 3/8 MX - Package Size 200 pc - 228335 - Conduit clip X-EMTC 1/2 MX - Package Size 200 pc - 228336 - Conduit clip X-EMTC 3/4 MX - Package Size 200 pc - 228337 - Conduit clip premium X-EMTC 1 MX - Package Size 200 pc - 2258449 - Conduit clip X-EMTC 1-1/4 MX - Package Size 200 pc
